channel.title: Installation on Coco AI App
channel.description: Recent content in Installation on Coco AI App

item.title: macOS
item.description: macOS # Download Coco AI # Go to coco.rs and download the package of your architecture: It should be placed in your “Downloads” folder: Unzip DMG file # Unzip the file: You will get a dmg file: Drag to Application Folder # Double click the dmg file, a window will pop up. Then drag the “Coco-AI” app to your “Applications” folder:

item.title: Ubuntu
item.description: Ubuntu # NOTE: Coco app only works fully under X11. Don’t know if you running X11 or not? take a look at this question! Install dependencies # $ sudo apt-get update $ sudo apt-get install -y libwebkit2gtk-4.1-dev libappindicator3-dev librsvg2-dev patchelf xdg-utils libtracker-sparql-3.0-dev Go to the download page # Download page: link Download the package # Download the package of your architecture, it should be put in your Downloads directory and look like this:

item.title: Windows
item.description: Windows # Download Coco AI # Goto https://coco.rs/ Install Wizard #
